title: Who's more OP right now out of Darius or Kat?
body: Poll is below. Also, who takes more skill to play?

replies.body:
I accidentally did Darius, but with these great forums we have i can simply edit my..... oh wait.

Katarina is broken and Darius is weak, they both take the same amount of skill tbh, Kat just rolls her face on the keyboard whereas Darius does not but his kit is still simple.
